This sounds like my experience of javablackbelt as a whole so far.
javatric=
kquestion would be a better title. I think the concept is
worthy and the wh=
ole community aspect is well implemented but it seems
that this site appeal=
s to people who like to catch others out with
trivia and trick questions.

=
I know the best way to improve this is to submit questions myself and
comme=
nt on the others but I suspect a lot of the community like it
just the way =
it is.

- Neil
